page.title: 08THE KNUTSFORD BAND
page.content: Knutsford Band is a self-supporting voluntary organisation and there is much good will towards the band throughout the town. The Band can be called a Brass Band or a Silver Band. There has been such a musical organisation in the town of Knutsford for more than 100 years. Many former Bandsmen still live in Knutsford and district and in several cases memories go back as far as the Band of the 1920's. There are four regular features in the Band's calendar: The Knutsford Royal May Day Celebrations, the Civic Sunday Parade, the Remembrance Day Parade and the Civic Christmas Concert.The remainder of the calendar is usually made up of a variety of outdoor performances at local garden parties and fetes during the summer and of indoor concerts in winter.
